actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE usuario_citas SET
		nombre = '{{update_form.fieldState.nombre.isVisible ? update_form.formData.nombre : update_form.sourceData.nombre}}',
		apellido = '{{update_form.fieldState.apellido.isVisible ? update_form.formData.apellido : update_form.sourceData.apellido}}',
    cedula = '{{update_form.fieldState.cedula.isVisible ? update_form.formData.cedula : update_form.sourceData.cedula}}',
		correo = '{{update_form.fieldState.correo.isVisible ? update_form.formData.correo : update_form.sourceData.correo}}',
		password = '{{update_form.fieldState.password.isVisible ? update_form.formData.password : update_form.sourceData.password}}',
		telefono = '{{update_form.fieldState.telefono.isVisible ? update_form.formData.telefono : update_form.sourceData.telefono}}'
WHERE id = {{data_table.selectedRow.id}};
